meanings.definition: The quality or state of being like a tiger in behavior or characteristics.
meanings.sent1: Her tigerishnesses in the competition made her a fierce opponent.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper admired the tigerishnesses of the majestic feline.
meanings.sent3: The little boy's tigerishnesses while playing pretend jungle explorer brought smiles to his parents.
meanings.sent4: His tigerishnesses on the soccer field earned him the nickname 'The Tiger'.
meanings.sent5: The actress portrayed the character with such tigerishnesses that the audience was captivated.

meanings.definition: The tendency to exhibit aggressive or predatory behavior similar to that of a tiger.
meanings.sent1: The tigerishnesses of the wild cat scared off other animals in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The hunter studied the tigerishnesses of the big cats before going on the safari.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's tigerishnesses at the playground made the other kids giggle.
meanings.sent4: His tigerishnesses in negotiations earned him the reputation of a tough businessman.
meanings.sent5: The soldier's tigerishnesses in battle were unmatched by any of his comrades.
